entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:09 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 12:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 84 %

Dewpoint: -3.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight then to flurries overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
